mapper.select: SELECT row_number() over ( order by STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(hd.deal_year, lpad(hd.deal_month, 2, '0'), lpad(hd.deal_day, 2, '0')), '%Y%m%d') desc ) as no , CONCAT(RIGHT(hd.deal_year,2), '.', hd.deal_month, '.', hd.deal_day) AS date , hd.floor , hd.exclu_use_ar , FLOOR(REPLACE(hd.deal_amount, ',', '')) AS deal_amount , CONCAT(FLOOR(REPLACE(hd.deal_amount, ',', '') / 10000), 'ì–µ ', LPAD(FORMAT(REPLACE(hd.deal_amount, ',', '') % 10000, 0), 4, '0')) AS price FROM houseinfos hi JOIN dongcodes dc ON CONCAT(hi.sgg_cd, hi.umd_cd) = dc.dong_code JOIN housedeals hd ON hi.apt_seq = hd.apt_seq WHERE hi.apt_seq = #{aptSeq};
